        case 2472: //donator portal

	c.getPA().movePlayer(2850, 2956, 0);
	c.sendMessage("You end up on a mysterious island known as the Donator Island.");

item.title: Resolved
item.dc:creator: @deans1243 deans1243
item.description:
@deans1243 wrote:

try this it was just some stuff i had in actionhandler thought it could work

case 2472: //donator portal if (c.memberStatus = 1) { c.getPA().movePlayer(2850, 2956, 0); } else { c.memberStatus = 0; c.getPA().movePlayer(2849, 2955, 0); break;

or

case 2472: //donator portal if (c.memberStatus = 1) { c.getPA().startTeleport(2850, 2956, 0); } else { c.memberStatus = 0; c.getPA().startTeleport(2849, 2955, 0); break;

Read full topic

I need to make that code work but I get errors.
I know there’s something wrong and I know I’m not a Java Guru or anything. Thanks for the help :)[/quote]
Post the error??

item.title: Resolved
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Resolved…

        case 2472: //donator portal
	if (c.memberStatus == 1) {
	c.getPA().movePlayer(2850, 2956, 0);
	c.sendMessage("You end up on a mysterious island known as the Donator Island.");
	} else {
		c.sendMessage("Hey! No cheating! You're not a donator!");
		c.sendMessage("To buy donator status, please go to the forums.");
		c.sendMessage("Url removed");
	}
            break;
